open Set Function Filter Asymptotics Metric Complex Bornology
open scoped Topology Filter Real

/-- Suppose z0 âˆˆ â„‚. Show that lim_{zâ†’ z0} f(z) = âˆž in the sense of the Riemann sphere if and only if for every M > 0 there exists a Î´ > 0 such that |f(z)| > M whenever |z - z0| < Î´. -/

    Tendsto f (ð“ zâ‚€) atTop â†” âˆ€ M > 0, âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ z, dist z zâ‚€ < Î´ â†’ M < norm (f z) := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Suppose z0 âˆˆ â„‚. Show that lim_{zâ†’ z0} f(z) = âˆž in the sense of the Riemann sphere
    iff for every M > 0 there exists a Î´ > 0 such that |f(z)| > M whenever |z âˆ’ z0| < Î´. -/
theorem tendsto_norm_atTop_iff (z0 : â„‚) (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) :
  Tendsto (fun z => â€–f zâ€–) (ð“ z0) atTop â†”
    âˆ€ M > 0, âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ z, dist z z0 < Î´ â†’ M < â€–f zâ€– := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/-! Suppose z0 âˆˆ â„‚. Show that lim_{zâ†’ z0} f(z) = âˆž in the sense of the Riemann sphere
    iff for every M > 0 there exists a Î´ > 0 such that |f(z)| > M whenever |z âˆ’ z0| < Î´. -/
theorem tendsto_riemannSphere_atTop_iff (z0 : â„‚) (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) :
  Tendsto (fun z => â€–f zâ€–) (ð“ z0) atTop â†”
    âˆ€ M > 0, âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ z, dist z z0 < Î´ â†’ M < â€–f zâ€– := by
  sorry

result: {"ok": true, "results": [{"nl": "For any two points $z, w$ in the upper half-plane $\\mathbb{H}$ and a real number $r$, the distance in the complex plane $\\mathbb{C}$ between $z$ and $w$'s center at radius $r$ in the upper half-plane model is given by $\\sqrt{2z_{\\text{im}}w_{\\text{im}}(\\cosh(d(z, w)) - \\cosh(r)) + (w_{\\text{im}}\\sinh(r))^2}$, where $z_{\\text{im}}$ and $w_{\\text{im}}$ denote the imaginary parts of $z$ and $w$ respectively, and $d(z, w)$ is the hyperbolic distance betwee
